Computer_Science_222_r$Computer_Science_.text:
Finding A: These navigational demands stimulate brain development, concludes a study five years in the making.
Finding B: "Here we have demonstrated the feasibility of adaptive deep brain stimulation," said Dr. Starr.
Finding C: In one regime one can cause an apparent violation of the usual second law, through a process of embezzling work from a large system which remains arbitrarily close to its original state.
Finding D: We used this information to focus restaurant inspections in two cities and demonstrated that FINDER improves the accuracy of health inspections; restaurants identified by FINDER are 3.1 times as likely to be deemed unsafe during the inspection as restaurants identified by existing methods.

Finding B: "Here we have demonstrated the feasibility of adaptive deep brain stimulation," said Dr. Starr.

Computer_Science_412_p$Computer_Science_.text:
Finding A: We used this information to focus restaurant inspections in two cities and demonstrated that FINDER improves the accuracy of health inspections; restaurants identified by FINDER are 3.1 times as likely to be deemed unsafe during the inspection as restaurants identified by existing methods.
Finding B: These results show that mixed-reality led to more learning than screen only, for both the mousecontrol and physical-control conditions ( Figure 10 ).
Finding C: The results "provide validation for empathy being a multi-component construct, suggesting that affective and cognitive empathy are differentially represented in brain morphometry as well as providing convergent evidence for empathy being represented by different neural and structural correlates," the study states.
Finding D: In other words, the locations and the number of refugees remain the same, they are just matched more precisely and systematically.

Computer_Science_188_p$Computer_Science_.text:
Finding A: At the aggregate level we find that the airlines that began charging for one checked bag saw a significant relative improvement in their on-time departure performance in the 35-day period afterwards, compared to the airlines that were not charging for a checked bag during the same time period.
Finding B: Most networks don\'t look scale-free at all."
Finding C: Even at more informal business lunches, the majority of people thought writing a text message is rude -- 66 percent said writing or sending a text message is inappropriate.
Finding D: The ordinary second law just corresponds to the non-increasing of one of these free energies, with the remainder imposing additional constraints on thermodynamic transitions.

Computer_Science_tweet_71_r$Computer_Sci.text:
Finding A: @username & @username researchers propose an interesting adaptive approach to improving deep brain stimulation for #Parkinsons using motor cortex sensing\n
Finding B: "The initial findings could have been explained by a correlation, that people with big hippocampi become taxi drivers," he says.
Finding C: These new second laws are generally not noticeable except on very small scales, at which point, they become increasingly important.
Finding D: New dorsal/ventral distinction in macaque medial PFC - DMFC signals errors, and ACC integrates errors to drive task switches. Very nice work showing causal relationship, organizes a lot of literature @username
Computer_Science_tweet_71_r$Computer_Sci.displayed_text:
Finding A: @username & @username researchers propose an interesting adaptive approach to improving deep brain stimulation for #Parkinsons using motor cortex sensing\n
Finding B: "The initial findings could have been explained by a correlation, that people with big hippocampi become taxi drivers," he says.
Finding C: These new second laws are generally not noticeable except on very small scales, at which point, they become increasingly important.
Finding D: New dorsal/ventral distinction in macaque medial PFC - DMFC signals errors, and ACC integrates errors to drive task switches. Very nice work showing causal relationship, organizes a lot of literature @username

Computer_Science_tweet_44_p$Computer_Sci.text:
Finding A: Critically, the human neuroimaging data available in BOLD5000 is: 1) significantly larger than prior slow event-related fMRI datasets by an order of magnitude; 2) extremely diverse in stimuli; 3) overlaps considerably with standard computer vision datasets.
Finding B: Maguire thinks that The Knowledge may enlarge the hippocampus's posterior (rear) at the expense of its anterior (front), creating a trade-off of cognitive talents--that is, taxi drivers master some forms of memory but become worse at others.
Finding C: Core #language skill in typically and atypically developing #children, including those with #autism spectrum disorders, is stable from infancy to adolescence. This suggests that when a child’s language skills are lagging, early intervention is best @username
Finding D: @username @username Once you get into long cook times you are adding enzymatic breakdown and protein denaturization to the game. Some say that greater than 4 hours and tender cuts (beef) turn mushy I disagree. Max time depends on what kind of protein. Do not 8hr chicken.
Computer_Science_tweet_44_p$Computer_Sci.displayed_text:
Finding A: Critically, the human neuroimaging data available in BOLD5000 is: 1) significantly larger than prior slow event-related fMRI datasets by an order of magnitude; 2) extremely diverse in stimuli; 3) overlaps considerably with standard computer vision datasets.
Finding B: Maguire thinks that The Knowledge may enlarge the hippocampus's posterior (rear) at the expense of its anterior (front), creating a trade-off of cognitive talents--that is, taxi drivers master some forms of memory but become worse at others.
Finding C: Core #language skill in typically and atypically developing #children, including those with #autism spectrum disorders, is stable from infancy to adolescence. This suggests that when a child’s language skills are lagging, early intervention is best @username
Finding D: @username @username Once you get into long cook times you are adding enzymatic breakdown and protein denaturization to the game. Some say that greater than 4 hours and tender cuts (beef) turn mushy I disagree. Max time depends on what kind of protein. Do not 8hr chicken.

Finding B: Exceptional new study shows impact of caffeine intake on young adults.
